titleInfo.title: Rekindling the Spirit: A Vision for the New Millennial Movement to Leave No Child Behind

mods.abstract: An account of the gathering of the Children's Defense Fund and the Black Community Crusade For Children at the former Alex Haley Farm in December 1997 to examine problems facing social reformers.
mods.note: The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

location.physicalLocation: University of Tennessee, Knoxville. Special Collections

mods.accessCondition: You may copy reprint, publish, reproduce, or otherwise display materials created by CDF or CDFAC and made available through a Children's Defense Fund Site (collectively, the "Children's Defense Fund Works") on the condition that you attribute those materials to CDF. Form of attribution to use: This material was created by the Children's Defense Fund.
